web_snippets: Michael Nathan Silver (born May 10, 1955) is a business executive, philanthropist, art collector, and commentator. ... ^ "Larry O'Connor Show - Mike Silver ...
Mike Silver holds a Masters of Building Design from Columbia University, and is both a LeFevre' 29 research fellow for The Knowlton School of Architecture ...
Mike Silver is co-founder, Chief Executive Officer and a Director of Lotus Gold Corporation. Mr. Silver has 20 years of resource sector experience.
